info.name: MyVillage API
info.description:
# MyVillage Schools Management Platform API

Complete API documentation for the MyVillage backend.

## Base URL
`http://localhost:3000/development/api/v1/sp`

## Authentication
All protected endpoints require a Bearer token in the `Authorization` header.

### User Types
- **SuperAdmin**: Platform administrators (token expires in 4 hours)
- **SchoolAdmin**: School users (token expires in 120 hours)

## How to Run All Tests
1. Set `adminEmail` and `adminPassword` collection variables
2. Set `schoolEmail` and `schoolPassword` collection variables
3. Click **Run Collection** → Select all requests → **Run**
4. The auto-login pre-request scripts will handle token management automatically

## Conventions
- Hungarian Notation: `s`=string/UUID, `b`=boolean, `i`=integer, `d`=decimal, `t`=timestamp, `a`=array, `o`=object
- Soft deletes via `bActive` flag
- Pagination: `iPageNumber` (>=1), `iItemsPerPage` (>=1), `sSearch` (optional)

item.name: 01 - Authentication
item.description:
Login, logout, password recovery and password setup endpoints.

No authentication required for login, recovery, setPassword, and verify.

request.description:
Authenticate a user. Detects user type automatically:
- Checks Administrators table first → SuperAdmin (4h token)
- Then SchoolUsers table → SchoolAdmin (120h token)

**Response includes:** `sToken`, `sUserType`, `oUser`, and `oSchool` (for SchoolAdmin only)
Login as a school user. Returns `oSchool` with `sSchoolId`, `sSchoolName`, `sSchoolLogo`, `oImages`.
Send a password recovery email. Detects if user is admin (uses ADMIN_PLATFORM URL) or school user (uses SCHOOLS_PLATFORM URL).

item.name: 04 - Administrators
item.description:
Administrator CRUD endpoints.

**Auth required:** SuperAdmin token with `Administración` module permissions.

All requests in this folder auto-login as SuperAdmin.

exec: // Auto-login as SuperAdmin if no token exists
body: { mode: 'raw', raw: JSON.stringify({ sEmail: email, sPassword: password }) }

request.description:
Create a new administrator.

**Requires:** `Administración` module WRITE permission

**Body:**
- `sName` (required)
- `sLastName` (required)
- `sSecondLastName` (optional)
- `sEmail` (required, valid email)
- `sPhoneNumber` (required, valid phone)
- `sPhoneExtension` (optional)
- `aAdministratorPermissionsSet` (required, array of `{sAdministratorModuleId, sActionCode}`)

Get all administrators with pagination.

**Requires:** `Administración` module READ permission

**Query params:**
- `sSearch` (optional)
- `iPageNumber` (optional, >=1)
- `iItemsPerPage` (optional, >=1)
- `bPlatformAccess` (optional, boolean filter)

Get all administrator permission modules.

**Requires:** `Administración` module READ permission

Get a single administrator by ID.

**Requires:** Own profile OR `Administración` module READ permission

**Path params:** `sAdministratorId` (UUID)

Update an administrator.

**Requires:** `Administración` module WRITE permission

Toggle administrator platform access.

**Requires:** `Administración` module WRITE permission

**Body:** `bPlatformAccess` (boolean, required)

Soft-delete an administrator.

**Requires:** `Administración` module WRITE permission

item.name: 05 - Schools
item.description:
School CRUD endpoints.

**Auth required:** SuperAdmin token with `General` module permissions.

All requests auto-login as SuperAdmin.

exec: body: { mode: 'raw', raw: JSON.stringify({ sEmail: email, sPassword: password }) }

request.description:
Get schools analytics dashboard data.

**Requires:** `General` module READ permission

Create a new school with its initial admin user.

**Requires:** `General` module WRITE permission

**Body:**
- `sName` (required) - School name
- `sPhone` (optional)
- `iUsersLimit` (required) - Max school users
- `iStudentsLimit` (required) - Max students
- `sAdminName` (required) - School admin first name
- `sLastName` (required) - School admin last name
- `sSecondLastName` (optional)
- `sEmail` (required) - School admin email (receives welcome email)

Get all schools with pagination.

**Requires:** `General` module READ permission

**Query params:**
- `sSearch`, `iPageNumber`, `iItemsPerPage`
- `bBlocked` (optional, filter by blocked status)

Get a single school by ID.

**Requires:** `General` module READ permission

Update a school.

**Requires:** `General` module WRITE permission

**Body:** `sName`, `sPhone`, `iUsersLimit`, `iStudentsLimit`

Toggle school blocked status.

**Requires:** `General` module WRITE permission

**Body:** `bBlocked` (boolean, required)

Upload or delete a school logo image.

**Requires:** `General` module WRITE permission

**Body (form-data):**
- `oImage` (file, optional)
- `bDeleteImage` (boolean, required - set true to remove current image)

Soft-delete a school.

**Requires:** `General` module WRITE permission

item.name: 07 - Goals
item.description:
Goal CRUD endpoints for student goals.

**Auth required:** SchoolAdmin token.

All requests auto-login as SchoolAdmin.

exec: body: { mode: 'raw', raw: JSON.stringify({ sEmail: email, sPassword: password }) }

request.description:
Create a new goal for a student.

**Body:**
- `sStudentId` (UUID, required)
- `sTitle` (required)
- `sDescription` (optional)
- `sMeasurementType` (required): `EXACTITUD` | `TAREAS` | `ESCALA` | `FRECUENCIA` | `DURACION` | `OPORTUNIDAD`
- `tStartDate` (required)
- `tTargetDate` (required)
- `iTargetValue`, `iTargetDuration`, `iScaleMin`, `iScaleMax`, `sFrequencyUnit` (optional, depends on measurement type)
- `aTasks` (optional, array of `{sTitle, iOrder}`)

Get all goals for a specific student.

**Path params:** `sStudentId` (UUID)
**Query params:** `sSearch`, `iPageNumber`, `iItemsPerPage`, `sStatus` (optional filter)
Get a single goal by ID.

Update a goal.

**Body:** Same as create minus `sStudentId` and `sMeasurementType`. Tasks include `bCompleted`.

Mark a goal as completed or not achieved.

**Body:** `sStatus` (required): `COMPLETED` | `NOT_ACHIEVED`
Soft-delete a goal.
